game.name: Mermeows: Chill Cat Mermaids
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Mermeows: Chill Cat Mermaids – where every splash brings a smile! In this enchanting idle clicker creature collection game, traverse hand-drawn lakes, hatch unique Mermeows, and upgrade serene habitats. Collect pearls and let magical currents carry you into a world of calm strategy.
